column3: [' (StepDescription: cook-cook the tomatoes cut-side down until they start to soften and colour)']
[' (StepDescription: crack-crack one egg in a bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Beat-Beat the contents of the bowl)']

column5: (StepDescription: Scoop-Scoop the tomatoes from the pan)

column4: ErrorDescription:Using wooden spatula instead of a spoon and not properly stirring the contents.)
